name: Deep Fat Fried: DFF vs THE WORLD
name_original: Deep Fat Fried: DFF vs THE WORLD
description:
The World gets Deep Fat Fried in this Action Adventure game that combines classic Beat 'em up, adventure puzzle, and arcade bullet hell gameplay in a pixel art world inspired by the Deep Fat Fried podcast.

Play as TJ "The Amazing Atheist" Kirk, Scotty "The Kaiser" Kirk, or PaulsEgo aka "The Ball", each with their own play style.  Build up your character by leveling up or through upgrading your equipment.   Respond to the DFF signal and resolve issues around the globe only the "Greatest Heroes of our Time" could take on.

Available for Windows
